string.text: Standard .45 ACP M3 Grease Gun Magazine

30 round magazine for the M3 "Grease Gun" smg. The M3 uses a magazine based on the British Sten gun magazine, using a double column, single feed design. This magazine was less reliable than the one used by the Thompson, it also required more effort to load.

30 round magazine for the M3 "Grease Gun" smg. Limited numbers of M3s were originally built in 9mm, along with some 9mm conversion kits. They were largely intended to be supplied to European resistance movements during German occupation, facilitating the use of captured ammunition.
